label: ERC20 Function
name: ERC20Function
description: Execute ERC20 function such as deposit, withdraw, get balance, etc

options.name: allowance
options.label: Get Allowance
options.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that spender will be allowed to spend on behalf of owner through transferFrom. This is zero by default.

options.name: approve
options.label: Approve
options.description: Sets amount as the allowance of spender over the caller’s tokens.

options.name: balanceOf
options.label: Get Balance
options.description: Returns the amount of tokens owned by account

options.name: totalSupply
options.label: Get ERC20 Total Supply
options.description: Returns the total supply of ERC20

options.name: transferFrom
options.label: Transfer From
options.description: Moves amount tokens from sender to recipient using the allowance mechanism. Amount is then deducted from the caller’s allowance.

inputParameters.label: Account Address
inputParameters.name: account
inputParameters.description: Account address to check for remaining amount

inputParameters.label: From Address
inputParameters.name: from
inputParameters.description: Account address to transfer the token

inputParameters.label: To Address
inputParameters.name: to
inputParameters.description: Account address to receive the token

inputParameters.label: Select Wallet
inputParameters.name: wallet
inputParameters.description: Wallet to move amount tokens from sender to recipient using the allowance mechanism

inputParameters.label: Select Wallet
inputParameters.name: wallet
inputParameters.description: Wallet to deposit ETH into ERC20 Token

inputParameters.label: Select Wallet
inputParameters.name: wallet
inputParameters.description: Withdraw ERC20 Token to this wallet

inputParameters.label: Gas Limit
inputParameters.name: gasLimit
inputParameters.description: Maximum price you are willing to pay when sending a transaction

inputParameters.label: Max Fee per Gas
inputParameters.name: maxFeePerGas
inputParameters.description: The maximum price (in wei) per unit of gas for transaction. See more

inputParameters.label: Max Priority Fee per Gas
inputParameters.name: maxPriorityFeePerGas
inputParameters.description: The priority fee price (in wei) per unit of gas for transaction. See more
